A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I enjoyed TFA and thought it set up TLJ well with many themes\, plots\, and characters to be explored. I am disappointed in TLJ for not exploring any of these and instead destroying them all. There was no continuity between this movie and the first and any new themes that were brought up were not very obvious due to clustered storyline. It leaves me wondering if the obliteration of all of these storylines in TLJ will lead to more shocking twists in the final episode of this trilogy. Positives of this movie are good scenery and Yoda
